categories: Category:Creatures of the Outer Rim Territories

nodes.text: Parvinoths were a species of silvery flying insects found throughout the Outer Rim Territories, including the planet Ashas Ree. They were bioluminescent, especially in sunlight, and harmless. During their visit to Ashas Ree, siblings Eila and Kel were entranced by a swarm of the insects, and followed them to the nearby Temple of the Force.
